name: llama villa (itch)
description:
The Sims but with llamas

Shower, feed and shear your llamas
Play with your llamas
Buy your llamas nice furniture
Build a llama villa

Controls

  • Mouse to interact
  • Arrow keys to move the camera
  • F1 to toggle walls
  • Game auto-saves, hold F10 to reset your save
